originalText.text: I used Sam's services when buying my home in Merrick. Not only was Sam very knowledgeable about the area, but he was helpful every step of the way in informing my wife and I what we should be looking for that fits our budget. His recommendations on attorneys, repairmen, inspectors, etc. led us to buying the home that we wanted and needed. As first-time home owners with zero experience, my wife and I felt at ease with Sam’s guidance. I would absolutely recommend Sam to anyone looking to buy a home.

originalText.text: My wife and I worked with Sam to purchase our first home and really can’t say enough good things about him. He is knowledgeable, approachable, personable, endlessly patient, and incredibly generous with his time (including mornings, evenings, and weekends over the course of several months). He  answered every question and explained every form and every part of the process clearly and thoroughly. Buying a home in this market is challenging, but working with Sam made it as painless and straightforward as possible. We highly recommend him.
